title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.1 - Rotation in assignment of pilots
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.1 - Rotation in assignment of pilots

State Regulations

The pilots in each category of pilots licensed by the
commissioners shall maintain a regular system of rotation in the assignment to
vessels of the pilots in their category, and any pilot who shall fail to accept
an assignment in accordance with such system and shall be subject to a fine not
exceeding $50 and a suspension of his license for not more than 30 days and, in
the event that the circumstances attending such failure shall involve
intoxication or wilful refusal to accept duty, such pilot shall be tried for
such offense or offenses. Notes

56.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
